Message.Issue:
'DivisionModel.DivisionModel()' contains a call chain that results in a call to a virtual method defined by the class. Review the following call stack for unintended consequences:
DivisionModel..ctor() DivisionModel.set_DivisionStaff(IList<StaffModel>):Void

'StaffClockModel.StaffClockModel(Guid, DateTime)' contains a call chain that results in a call to a virtual method defined by the class. Review the following call stack for unintended consequences:
StaffClockModel..ctor(Guid, DateTime) BaseModel.set_RecordStatus(String):Void

'StaffClockModel.StaffClockModel(Guid, DateTime)' contains a call chain that results in a call to a virtual method defined by the class. Review the following call stack for unintended consequences:
StaffClockModel..ctor(Guid, DateTime) StaffClockModel.set_ClockDateTime(DateTime):Void

'StaffClockModel.StaffClockModel(Guid, DateTime)' contains a call chain that results in a call to a virtual method defined by the class. Review the following call stack for unintended consequences:
StaffClockModel..ctor(Guid, DateTime) StaffClockModel.set_OriginalClockDateTime(DateTime):Void

'StaffClockModel.StaffClockModel(Guid, DateTime)' contains a call chain that results in a call to a virtual method defined by the class. Review the following call stack for unintended consequences:
StaffClockModel..ctor(Guid, DateTime) StaffClockModel.set_StaffId(Guid):Void

'StaffClockModel.StaffClockModel(Guid, DateTime, bool)' contains a call chain that results in a call to a virtual method defined by the class. Review the following call stack for unintended consequences:
StaffClockModel..ctor(Guid, DateTime, Boolean) BaseModel.set_RecordStatus(String):Void

Rule.Name: Do not call overridable methods in constructors
Rule.Description: Virtual methods defined on the class should not be called from constructors. If a derived class has overridden the method, the derived class version will be called (before the derived class constructor is called).
Rule.Resolution: {0} contains a call chain that results in a call to a virtual method defined by the class. Review the following call stack for unintended consequences: {1}
